item.title: Jen add a quote by Mahatma Gandhi
item.description: "Be the change that you wish to see in the world." -- Mahatma Gandhi

item.title: Jen add a quote by Bernard M. Baruch
item.description: "Be who you are and say what you feel, because those who mind don't matter, and those who matter don't mind." -- Bernard M. Baruch

item.title: Jen add a quote by James L. Ferrell
item.description: "Being Mistreated is the most important condition of mortality, for eternity itself depends on how we view those who mistreat us." -- James L. Ferrell

item.title: Jen add a quote by James L. Ferrell
item.description: "Righteousness is simply a humble understanding of how unrighteous one is coupled with a deep commitment to become better." -- James L. Ferrell

item.title: Jen add a quote by James L. Ferrell
item.description: "Anything that makes me feel better (or worse) than another is darkness; anything that makes me feel one with others is divine. So the natural instinct to try to lift others by helping them to feel good about themselves relative to others is exactly the wrong way to help. True happiness is found not in a belief that I am better but in the obliteration of any need to be." -- James L. Ferrell
